long_description: The Timbuk2 Swig daypack carries your computer and all the other daily trappings you can't live without. A convenient side zipper means you don't have to fully remove the pack to access your laptop. Fully padded, low-profile compartment with side zipper protects up to a 15 in. laptop; just slip off one shoulder strap and swing the pack around to quickly grab your computer. 2 large internal compartments accommodate loads of stuff and the organization panel makes it easy to find your keys; exterior flap closure keeps wet weather from getting in. External side pocket holds your U-lock (sold separately) or your water bottle. Lightweight ergonomic shoulder straps are shaped to fit comfortably; on-strap bottle opener is handy whenever the need arises. Ventilated back panel on the Timbuk2 Swig daypack helps keep your back cool. Top grab handle; blinky light loop (light sold separately). Durable ballistic nylon fabric handles the daily grind; top grab handle eases handling.
short_description: The Timbuk2 Swig daypack carries your computer and all the other daily trappings you can't live without. A convenient side zipper means you don't have to fully remove the pack to access your laptop.
